csci331.team.red.server

Class AlertHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • csci331.team.red.server.AlertHandler

  • public class AlertHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler class for generating (semi) random alerts. Contains several hard-coded enums, arrays, and strings which represent the possible kinds, (and wording) of alerts.
    Author:
    ojourmel
